job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>The Remote Company&nbsp;</strong>is a network of remote-first tech companies. We're united by our values and approach to doing business. You will work with products like MailerLite, MailerSend, MailerCheck, and Ycode.</p><p><br></p><p>We're looking for a&nbsp;<strong>Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)</strong>&nbsp;that is eager to maintain and improve our infrastructure. You're knowledgeable in Docker and Kubernetes, and have experience with IaC tools. Furthermore, you're a great team player with a positive attitude.</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>Wh<strong>y The Remote Company?</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li><strong>You won’t be bored</strong></li></ul><p>We will consistently maintain and improve our infrastructure. You will work with Google Cloud, Kubernetes, and more.</p><p><br></p><ul><li><strong>You will be challenged with interesting tasks</strong></li></ul><p>Did you come up with an idea that could automate processes? We encourage you to share, own, and implement your ideas!</p><p><br></p><ul><li><strong>You will take ownership</strong></li></ul><p>We don’t micromanage and try not to interrupt your work with random tasks. We do expect you to take full responsibility and ownership for the stuff you build.</p><p><br></p><ul><li><strong>You will have experts at hand</strong></li></ul><p>Whenever you’re stuck, your teammates are eager to help you grow. And they’d love for you to share your knowledge too!</p><p><br></p><ul><li><strong>You can pick where you want to work, every day</strong></li></ul><p>At The Remote Company, we embrace the remote culture. Every day you get to choose what environment makes you most productive.</p><p><br></p><ul><li><strong>You can count on stability</strong></li></ul><p>You can count on us to offer you a stable workplace! We're continuously growing and our oldest company, MailerLite, has been around for more than 10 years.</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong>What we expect from you</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Knowledgeable in Docker and Kubernetes</li><li>Experience with IaC tools (any)</li><li>Experience with NGiNX, MySQL, PostgreSQL, PHP, Redis, ElasticSearch</li><li>Background in Linux/Unix</li><li>Experience with monitoring tools</li><li>Networking knowledge</li><li>You look for automation possibilities when doing redundant tasks</li><li>You're a great team player with a positive attitude</li><li>You have a sense of personal responsibility</li><li>You consistently want to learn more and improve your skills</li><li>Proficient verbal and written communication skills in English</li><li>This position is full-time (40 hours per week)</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong>What we offer</strong></p><ul><li>Salary: $50,000-$55,000 (gross)</li><li>Remote-first culture with&nbsp;the team&nbsp;working remotely from all over the world</li><li>Remote health insurance. Every team member gets global health insurance with full coverage in their home country and 175+ countries. No exclusions for pandemics.</li><li>Company-paid retreats that we call&nbsp;workations. The whole company gathers once a year for a week in an exotic location to work, learn and have fun together.</li><li>Team meet-up once a year. You and your team will get a budget to meet and bond in a location of your choice.</li><li>Four weeks of vacation. We encourage you to unplug and recharge!</li><li>Parenting budget. Anyone who becomes a parent through childbirth or adoption gets a budget as a gift from us to you!</li><li>Annual benefits, which include a budget for home office setup, personal development, leisure trips, etc.</li><li>MacBook and other tools that'll help you to do your job efficiently</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Interested?</strong></p><p>Please don’t send us your CV. Instead, simply send us an application email with the below information to&nbsp;<strong><u>jobs@remotecompany.com</u></strong></p><p>.</p><p><strong>Things we want to see in your email:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>The title of this role in your email subject line</li><li>How you heard about this job</li><li>Links to your Github, Gitlab, LinkedIn (necessary), Twitter, Facebook, or personal homepage</li><li>Previous work experience, including your role and projects</li><li>Why you want to join The Remote Company</li><li>Your remote work experience</li><li>A description of a project or product that you loved working on and why</li><li>Expected salary</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>W<strong>ish you all the best of luck!</strong></p><p><br></p>
